mapper.select: SELECT MOVIE.MOVIE_TITLE AS mvTitle, MOVIE.MOVIE_STAR AS mvStar, MOVIE.MOVIE_DETAIL AS mvDetail , MOVIE.MOVIE_DIRECTOR AS mvDirector, MOVIE.MOVIE_ID AS mvId FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT MOVIE.MOVIE_TITLE AS mvTitle, MOVIE.MOVIE_STAR AS mvStar, MOVIE.MOVIE_DETAIL AS mvDetail , MOVIE.MOVIE_DIRECTOR AS mvDirector, MOVIE.MOVIE_ID AS mvId, MOVIE.MOVIE_OPENDATE AS openDate FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE.MOVIE_opendate >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 365
